A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i'm a huge Star Wars fan but this one is absolutely horrible  in almost every way possible. Choppy.  Doesn't flow well. Forced humor. Cheesy. Corny. Pointless scenes. Ignores the rules of science.  Annoying characters. Annoying creatures. Characters do things that are out of character for them. Weak conflicted villain. Throws away potentially great ideas. Underwhelming
